function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient removal of formaldehyde and toluene due to incorrect bed water content levels","Impact":"Poor air quality and increased health risks from exposure to formaldehyde and toluene","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of bed water content levels and adjustment to maintain optimal range","Technologies":"Sensor-based monitoring systems for maintaining optimal bed water content","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, environmental consultants"},{"Description":"Inadequate performance of the botanical filter for both water soluble and insoluble compounds at extreme bed water content levels","Impact":"Decreased air purification efficiency and potential health risks from exposure to pollutants","Mitigation":"Research and development of improved botanical filter designs for wider range of bed water content levels","Technologies":"Advanced botanical filter technologies with improved water management systems","People":"Researchers, environmental engineers","Owner":"Environmental engineering firms, research institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of the wet film in removing formaldehyde from the air due to improper water content","Impact":"Increased levels of formaldehyde in the air and potential health risks for occupants","Mitigation":"Optimization of water content to ensure efficient scrubbing of formaldehyde","Technologies":"Advanced water content monitoring and control systems for the wet film","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, environmental engineers"}]}
